name: private-captcha
description: PrivateCaptcha is a self-hosted CAPTCHA system designed to prevent unwanted submissions without relying on third-party services. It supports customizable widgets and easy integration for privacy-conscious apps.
features: Self-hosted verification: Prevent spam and bot submissions without relying on third-party CAPTCHA services.
Privacy protection: No user data sent to external services, ensuring complete privacy compliance.
Customizable widgets: Configure CAPTCHA appearance and difficulty to match your application design.
Easy integration: Simple API and JavaScript widgets for quick integration into web forms.
Multiple challenge types: Support for image-based, text-based, and mathematical challenges.
Accessibility options: Provide alternative verification methods for users with disabilities.
Rate limiting: Built-in protection against brute-force attempts and automated attacks.
Analytics dashboard: Monitor CAPTCHA solve rates, failure patterns, and potential attack attempts.
Lightweight implementation: Minimal resource usage and fast loading times for optimal user experience.
API access: Programmatically verify CAPTCHA responses for server-side validation.
Multi-language support: Display challenges in multiple languages for global audiences.
Session management: Track verification status across user sessions to prevent repeated challenges.
